name: Direct TPV
tagline: A new direction in Third Party Verification.
description:
We offer complete third party verification solutions. Live agents, automated services or our seemless hybrid solutions. Our platform was developed in-house exclusively to offer the highest quality and feature driven caller experience in the industry. We can customize a TPV script to fit any need you may have. We can handle any size project, from enterprise level call centers to low volume projects. While offering the same level of support to all customers.
Our services span across all industries. We can integrate easily to any back office system through various protocols. Our multiple carrier grade facilities with automatic failover offer an extremely high level of reliability. Each facility utilizes redundant hardware and telecom lines to ensure our platform runs continually without interruption, and in the event of a catstrophic failure calls are automatically and seemlessly routed to another facility.
